name: You must own or have rights to the data you store
reason: This has been judged irrelevant because this is a normal, realistic expectation.
title: You must own or have rights to all data you store on Cloudant

tosdr.tldr: You can't upload, or help others upload, any content that infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, or other proprietary rights or contractual rights of anyone.
